mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d(%a) %H:%i:%S') AS TL_DATE_FORMAT, DATE_FORMAT(TL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS TL_DATE, TL_TITLE FROM TODO_LIST WHERE (TL_DATE, TL_SEQ) IN (SELECT TL_DATE, MIN(TL_SEQ) FROM TODO_LIST GROUP BY TL_DATE) ORDER BY TL_DATE DESC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d(%a) %H:%i:%S') AS TL_DATE, TL_TITLE FROM TODO_LIST WHERE TL_DATE = #{TL_DATE} ORDER BY TL_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODO_LIST (TL_DATE, TL_TITLE, ALT_USER, ALT_DATE) VALUES (#{TL_DATE}, #{TL_TITLE}, #{ALT_USER}, SYSDATE())
